attributes.action: resign and call a General Election forthwith, as we have no confidence in this Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This Government has plumbed new depths in sleazy, underhanded tactics and operations.We're involved in an unpopular war, to be on-side with one of the world's least democratic states, and has precipitated domestic terrorism. It has wasted, and is prepared to waste more billions. A new Government is urgently needed, not a coronation of Mr Brown.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
